text:
Source: https://t.co/QgiFnctPqR Follow Bradley as he goes for his #COVID19 #Vaccine in our newest #EasyRead #Coronavirus #Poster for #LearningDisability.
There’s audio and a version you can add your own text and photos. Free to download, print and share.
